Introduction
This topic contains information on the processing of VR&E claims filed prior to separation, including
handling VR&E claims received from service members
, and
actions intake sites must take upon receipt of
VA Form 28-1900, Application for Veteran Readiness and Employment for Claimants With Service-Connected Disabilities
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section D - Ancillary Benefits and Other Issues Involving Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD) or BDD-Excluded Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section D
